snippet: In Andy Pettitte, , the Yankees have again turned to a great from the past, underscoring the franchise’s struggle to develop young starters.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column asserts that the return of pitcher Andy Pettitte to New York Yankees underscores the franchise's struggle to develop young starters.
lead_paragraph: In Andy Pettitte, , the Yankees have again turned to a great from the past, underscoring the franchise’s struggle to develop young starters.

headline.seo: Andy Pettitte Not What Yankees Need
headline.main: An Aging Savior Isn’t What the Yanks Need
headline.print_headline: Aging Savior Isn’t What Yanks Need
